{"id":1026358437,"question_id":2832,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1692503434,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1026358437/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Longest Equal Subarray","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int longestEqualSubarray(List<Integer> nums, int k) {\n        int len = nums.size();\n        \n        int st= 0;\n        \n        HashMap<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        \n        int res =0 ;\n        int max=0;\n        int most = -1;\n        int others=0;\n        //[1,3,2,3,1,3]\n            \n        for(int ed=0; ed<len; ed++){\n            \n            int n = nums.get(ed);\n            \n            map.put(n, map.getOrDefault(n, 0)+1);\n            \n            if(map.get(n)>max){\n                max = map.get(n);\n                most= n;\n                others = ed-st+1 - max;\n            }\n            \n            // System.out.println(ed + \" \"  + others);\n            \n            \n            \n            while(others>k){\n                \n                int nn = nums.get(st);\n                map.put(nn, map.get(nn)-1);\n                if(map.get(nn)==0)\n                    map.remove(nn);\n                \n                st++;\n            }\n            \n            // the key is below : \n            res = Math.max(res, ed-st+1-others);   // find longest;\n            // res+=(ed-st+1);                    // find total number of subarray\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-longest-equal-subarray","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
